summary: This is a forwarded email from November 4, 2021, containing a Law360 news alert about Ghislaine Maxwell's attorney comparing her jail conditions to the movie 'Silence of the Lambs' in a letter to a New York federal court, pressing for her release.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Former associate of Jeffrey Epstein; her attorney is pressing for her release from jail, with conditions likened to a movie.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Deceased financier; mentioned as the person Maxwell was an associate of.

connections.description: Maxwell is described as a former associate of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Maxwell's Attorney Files Letter for Release
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's attorney filed a letter with a New York federal court pressing for her release, likening her prison conditions to scenes from the movie 'Silence of the Lambs'.

locations: 111 West 19th Street, 5th Floor, New York, NY 10011
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's attorney compared her jail conditions to Dr. Hannibal Lecter's incarceration in the movie 'Silence of the Lambs'.
The attorney pressed a New York federal court for Maxwell's release in a letter filed on November 3, 2021.
Maxwell is described as a former associate of Jeffrey Epstein.
The document is a forwarded email containing a Law360 news alert from November 4, 2021.
